name: @contiva/sap-integration-suite-client
author: Contiva GmbH <mail@contiva.com>
description: SAP Cloud Platform Integration API Client

scripts.release:npm:patch: git push && npm version patch && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:npm:minor: git push && npm version minor && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:npm:major: git push && npm version major && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:github:patch: git push && npm version patch && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:github:minor: git push && npm version minor && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:github:major: git push && npm version major && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:all:patch: git push && npm version patch && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:all:minor: git push && npm version minor && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:all:major: git push && npm version major && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && npm publish --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && git push && git push --tags
